description: This file defines a RecyclerView Adapter called RestaurantAdapter for displaying a list of restaurant items, including handling user interactions such as toggling favorites and clicking on a restaurant.

classes.name: RestaurantAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView ListAdapter for displaying Restaurant items with support for favorites and item clicks.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for the RestaurantAdapter, holding references to UI components within each list item.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the ViewHolder, updating UI elements based on restaurant data and favorite status.
